data.name: MeetLight and the secrets of the universe
data.detailed_description:
MeetLight, a relaxing game without combat, with a deep story between fiction and reality, which makes you dream and allows you to take a pleasant break while taking a step back.

Play as Anna who has just experienced a terrible tragedy and be part of her new life, in the physical world but also in the spirit one.
During the day, you will take over your great-uncle’s forge and become the new blacksmith. Build your new house from scratch, customize your appearance, befriend animals, nature and your neighbors, trade with the village, and give them a hand if you want to. But at night, while your body recovers from a tough day, be ready to enter the spirit world ! Meet its inhabitants and discover the secrets of the universe.


FEATURES
  • Skill system : Improve your skills over time, you have 6 skills than will grow on their own skill tree with time and work. Forging, farming, cooking, extraction, trading and building.

  • Forging : Craft hundreds of parts and assemble them into tools or machines.

  • Farming : «you reap what you sow». Grow your own crops and take care of them, maybe a fairy will give you a hand ?

  • Cooking : Cook over 50 different delicious meals helping you in various ways.

  • Extraction : Get the raw materials to start working, and learn how to get them in higher quality or quantity.

  • Trading : Craft goods and build trade relationship with the villagers.

  • Quality system : Every craft has a final quality depending on your skill, materials and tools, ranked from « bad » to « masterpiece » the higher the best. But you have much to learn first !

  • Quests : Be part of the community of Alaya's Valley, run your business, meet the villagers here and see what you can do for them.

  • Open world : Explore the huge open world map, full of life and secrets to discover.

  • Night time : At night your journey dooesn't stop, explore the spirituals realms, meet fantastic beeings and learn about the universe.

  • Building : Build and furnish fully your own house that you made from scratch, walls after walls, with our fantastic Building System.

  • Customize the appearance of your character from the outfit to the hair style.

  • Controller support.

data.short_description: MeetLight is a fantastic indie RPG, with crafting, farming, building, and a unique spiritual story. Run your forge by day, take care of your farm and trade with the villagers then explore the energetical worlds and meet their inhabitants at night ! Have fun in our relaxing open-world 3D landscape !
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Japanese, Russian, Thai
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“MeetLight could be the perfect combo of Valheim and Stardew Valley. If it can make good on the promise of those robust mechanics, it could become a standout in a crowded genre”
Gameradar - Entertainment website

“The moment we saw the gameplay footage, we were amazed by MeetLight‘s world. If you want to relax with lots of birds chirping in the beautiful natural world, MeetLight will be the best option for you”
Lawod - Gaming news website

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz, AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940. Finding a Gaming CPUs performance chart and comparing one's CPU with our minimum is suggested.
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 or AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
